item.title: NSS Static Analysis
item.description: When I started working on NSS 7 months ago one of the tasks I was asked to do was to work through the related Coverity issues. This post summarises some learnings from this as we’ve since come a long way since over the last months. Static analysis plays a crucial part in locating vulnerabilities and bugs during development. For NSS we currently use multiple static analysis tools. While scan-build as well as infer are great applications to find bugs, they require a lot of manual management.
